item.title: Function
item.description: Function A function is a relation in which there is only one output for each inputÂ

item.title: What is the difference between Relation and Function
item.description: What is the difference between relationship and a function a [[nibm_notes/mathematics_for_computing/sets_and_relations/relation|relationship]] can have many outputs for a single input, but a [[nibm_notes/mathematics_for_computing/sets_and_relations/function_math|function]] has a single input for a single output
